00034 #define   ENV_TOD_FLAGS_DAY                                                         0x00000001
00035 #define   ENV_TOD_FLAGS_DAWN                                                  0x00000002
00036 #define   ENV_TOD_FLAGS_DUSK                                                  0x00000004
00037 #define   ENV_TOD_FLAGS_NIGHT                                                 0x00000008

00039 /*
00040 #define           DAWNLIGHT_START                                                               ( 5 * 60 )
00041 #define           DAWN_START                                                                          ( 6 * 60 )
00042 #define   DAY_START                                                                                   ( 8 * 60 )
00043 #define           TWILLIGHT_START                                                               ( 19 * 60 )
00044 #define           DUSK_START                                                                          ( 20 * 60 )
00045 #define   NIGHT_START                                                                           ( 22 * 60 )
00046 */
00047 #define           DAWN_START                                                                          ( 6 * 60 + 47 )         //6:47AM
00048 #define   DAY_START                                                                                   ( 7 * 60 + 5 )          //7:05AM
00049 #define           DUSK_START                                                                          ( 20 * 60 + 57 )  //8:57PM
00050 #define   NIGHT_START                                                                           ( 21 * 60 + 15 )  //9:15PM
00051 
00052 #define           DAWN_TO_DAY                                                                         (DAY_START-DAWN_START)
00053 #define           DAY_TO_DUSK                                                                         (DUSK_START-DAY_START)
00054 #define           DUSK_TO_NIGHT                                                                       (NIGHT_START-DUSK_START)
00055 #define           NIGHT_TO_DAWN                                                                       (24*60-NIGHT_START+DAWN_START)

00169 // polled by the game to handle time/atmosphere changes from gamescreen
00170 void EnvironmentController( BOOLEAN fCheckForLights )
00171 {
00172       UINT32                   uiOldWorldHour;
00173       UINT8                    ubLightAdjustFromWeather = 0;
00174 
00175 
00176       // do none of this stuff in the basement or caves
00177       if( gfBasement || gfCaves )
00178       {
00179         guiEnvWeather   &= (~WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS );
00180         guiEnvWeather   &= (~WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS );
00181 
00182             if (gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RAIN_SOUND ] == TRUE)
00183             {
00184                   if ( guiRainLoop != NO_SAMPLE )
00185                   {
00186                         SoundStop( guiRainLoop );
00187                         guiRainLoop = NO_SAMPLE;
00188                   }
00189             }
00190             return;
00191       }
00192 
00193       if(fTimeOfDayControls )
00194       {
00195             uiOldWorldHour = GetWorldHour();
00196 
00197             // If hour is different
00198             if ( uiOldWorldHour != guiEnvTime )
00199             {
00200                   // Hour change....
00201       
00202                   guiEnvTime=uiOldWorldHour;
00203             }
00204 
00205             //ExecuteStrategicEventsUntilTimeStamp( (UINT16)GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
00206 
00207             // Polled weather stuff...
00208             // ONly do indooors
00209             if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00210             {
00211 //#if 0 //rain
00212                   if ( guiEnvWeather & ( WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS | WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS ) )
00213                   {
00214 
00215                         if (gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RAIN_SOUND ] == TRUE)
00216                         {
00217                               if ( guiRainLoop == NO_SAMPLE )
00218                               {
00219                                     guiRainLoop = PlayJA2Ambient( RAIN_1, BTNVOLUME, 0 );
00220                               }
00221                         }
00222 
00223                         // Do lightning if we want...
00224                         if ( guiEnvWeather & ( WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS ) )
00225                         {
00226                               EnvDoLightning( );
00227                         }
00228 
00229                   }
00230                   else
00231                   {
00232                         if (gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RAIN_SOUND ] == TRUE)
00233                         {
00234                               if ( guiRainLoop != NO_SAMPLE )
00235                               {
00236                                     SoundStop( guiRainLoop );
00237                                     guiRainLoop = NO_SAMPLE;
00238                               }
00239                         }
00240                   }
00241 //#endif //rain
00242             }
00243 
00244             if ( gfDoLighting && fCheckForLights )
00245             {
00246                   // Adjust light level based on weather...
00247                   ubLightAdjustFromWeather = GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel();
00248 
00249                   // ONly do indooors
00250                   if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00251                   {
00252                         // Rain storms....
00253 //#if 0 //rain
00254                         if ( guiEnvWeather & ( WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS | WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS ) )
00255                         {
00256                               // Thunder showers.. make darker
00257                               if ( guiEnvWeather & ( WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS ) )
00258                               {
00259                                     ubLightAdjustFromWeather = (UINT8)(__min( gubEnvLightValue+2, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ));
00260                               }
00261                               else
00262                               {
00263                                     ubLightAdjustFromWeather = (UINT8)(__min( gubEnvLightValue+1, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ));
00264                               }
00265                         }
00266 //#endif //rain
00267                   }
00268 
00269 
00270                   LightSetBaseLevel( ubLightAdjustFromWeather );
00271 
00272                   //Update Merc Lights since the above function modifies it.
00273                   HandlePlayerTogglingLightEffects( FALSE );
00274 
00275                   // Make teams look for all
00276                   // AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
00277 
00278                   // Set global light value
00279                   SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00280                   gfDoLighting = FALSE;
00281             }
00282 
00283       }
00284       
00285 }
00286 
00287 void BuildDayLightLevels()
00288 {
00289       UINT32 uiLoop, uiHour;
00290 
00291       /*
00292       // Dawn; light 12
00293       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHANGELIGHTVAL, DAWNLIGHT_START, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - 1 );
00294 
00295       // loop from light 12 down to light 4
00296       for (uiLoop = 1; uiLoop < 8; uiLoop++)
00297       {
00298             AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHANGELIGHTVAL, DAWN_START + 15 * uiLoop,    NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - 1 - uiLoop );
00299       }
00300       */
00301 
00302       //Transition from night to day
00303       for( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < 9; uiLoop++ )
00304       {
00305             AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHANGELIGHTVAL, DAWN_START + 2 * uiLoop,     NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT - 1 - uiLoop );
00306       }
00307 
00308       // Add events for hot times
00309       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, DESERT_WARM_START, TEMPERATURE_DESERT_WARM );
00310       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, DESERT_HOT_START, TEMPERATURE_DESERT_HOT );
00311       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, DESERT_HOT_END, TEMPERATURE_DESERT_WARM );
00312       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, DESERT_WARM_END, TEMPERATURE_DESERT_COOL );
00313 
00314       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, GLOBAL_WARM_START, TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_WARM );
00315       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, GLOBAL_HOT_START, TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_HOT );
00316       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, GLOBAL_HOT_END, TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_WARM );
00317       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TEMPERATURE_UPDATE, GLOBAL_WARM_END, TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_COOL );
00318       
00319 /*
00320       // Twilight; light 5
00321       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHANGELIGHTVAL, TWILLIGHT_START, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY + 1 );
00322       
00323       // Dusk; loop from light 5 up to 12
00324       for (uiLoop = 1; uiLoop < 8; uiLoop++)
00325       {
00326             AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHANGELIGHTVAL, DUSK_START + 15 * uiLoop, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY + 1 + uiLoop );
00327       }
00328 */
00329 
00330       //Transition from day to night
00331       for( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < 9; uiLoop++ )
00332       {
00333             AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_CHANGELIGHTVAL, DUSK_START + 2 * uiLoop,     NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_DAY + 1 + uiLoop );
00334       }
00335 
00336       //Set up the scheduling for turning lights on and off based on the various types.
00337       uiHour = NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_START_HOUR == 24 ? 0 : NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_START_HOUR;
00338       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TURN_ON_NIGHT_LIGHTS, uiHour * 60, 0 );
00339       uiHour = NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_END_HOUR == 24 ? 0 : NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_END_HOUR;
00340       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TURN_OFF_NIGHT_LIGHTS, uiHour * 60, 0 );
00341       uiHour = PRIME_TIME_LIGHT_START_HOUR == 24 ? 0 : PRIME_TIME_LIGHT_START_HOUR;
00342       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TURN_ON_PRIME_LIGHTS, uiHour * 60, 0 );
00343       uiHour = PRIME_TIME_LIGHT_END_HOUR == 24 ? 0 : PRIME_TIME_LIGHT_END_HOUR;
00344       AddEveryDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_TURN_OFF_PRIME_LIGHTS, uiHour * 60, 0 );
00345 }
00346 
00347 void BuildDayAmbientSounds( )
00348 {
00349       INT32                                                 cnt;
00350 
00351       // Add events!
00352       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gsNumAmbData; cnt++ )
00353       {
00354             switch( gAmbData[ cnt ].ubTimeCatagory )
00355             {
00356                   case AMB_TOD_DAWN:
00357                         AddSameDayRangedStrategicEvent( EVENT_AMBIENT, DAWN_START, DAWN_TO_DAY, cnt );
00358                         break;
00359                   case AMB_TOD_DAY:
00360                         AddSameDayRangedStrategicEvent( EVENT_AMBIENT, DAY_START, DAY_TO_DUSK, cnt );
00361                         break;
00362                   case AMB_TOD_DUSK:
00363                         AddSameDayRangedStrategicEvent( EVENT_AMBIENT, DUSK_START, DUSK_TO_NIGHT, cnt );
00364                         break;
00365                   case AMB_TOD_NIGHT:
00366                         AddSameDayRangedStrategicEvent( EVENT_AMBIENT, NIGHT_START, NIGHT_TO_DAWN, cnt );
00367                         break;
00368             }
00369 
00370       }
00371 
00372       //guiRainLoop = NO_SAMPLE;
00373 
00374       //rain
00375       if (gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RAIN_SOUND ] == TRUE)
00376       {
00377             if ( guiRainLoop != NO_SAMPLE )
00378             {
00379                   SoundStop( guiRainLoop );
00380                   guiRainLoop = NO_SAMPLE;
00381             }
00382       }
00383       //end rain
00384 }

00389 void ForecastDayEvents( )
00390 {
00391       UINT32 uiOldDay;
00392       UINT32 uiStartTime, uiEndTime;
00393       UINT8  ubStormIntensity;
00394 //    UINT32 cnt;
00395 
00396       // Get current day and see if different
00397       if ( ( uiOldDay = GetWorldDay() ) != guiEnvDay )
00398       {
00399             // It's a new day, forecast weather
00400             guiEnvDay = uiOldDay;
00401 
00402             // Set light level changes
00403             //BuildDayLightLevels();
00404 
00405             // Build ambient sound queues
00406             BuildDayAmbientSounds( );
00407 
00408             // Build weather....
00409             
00410             // ATE: Don't forecast if start of game...
00411             if ( guiEnvDay > 1 )
00412             {
00413                   //rain                  
00414                   if ( Random( 100 ) < gGameExternalOptions.gusRainChancePerDay )
00415                   {
00416                         // Add rain!
00417                         // Between 6:00 and 10:00
00418                         uiStartTime = (UINT32)( Random( 1440 - 1 - gGameExternalOptions.gusRainMaxLength  ) );
00419                         // Between 5 - 15 miniutes
00420                         uiEndTime         = uiStartTime + ( gGameExternalOptions.gusRainMinLength + Random( gGameExternalOptions.gusRainMaxLength - gGameExternalOptions.gusRainMinLength ) );
00421 
00422                         ubStormIntensity = 0;
00423 
00424                         // Randomze for a storm!
00425                         if ( Random( 10 ) < 5 )
00426                         {
00427                               ubStormIntensity = 1;
00428                         }
00429       
00430                         if( gGameExternalOptions.gfAllowRain ) AddSameDayRangedStrategicEvent( EVENT_RAINSTORM, uiStartTime, uiEndTime - uiStartTime, ubStormIntensity );
00431 
00432                         //AddSameDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_BEGINRAINSTORM, uiStartTime, ubStormIntensity );
00433                         //AddSameDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_ENDRAINSTORM,       uiEndTime, 0 );
00434                   }
00435                   //end rain
00436                   
00437 
00438                   /*
00439                   // Should it rain...?
00440                   if ( Random( 100 ) < 20 )
00441                   {
00442                         // Add rain!
00443                         // Between 6:00 and 10:00
00444                         uiStartTime = (UINT32)( 360 + Random( 1080 ) );
00445                         // Between 5 - 15 miniutes
00446                         uiEndTime         = uiStartTime + ( 5 + Random( 10 ) );
00447 
00448                         ubStormIntensity = 0;
00449 
00450                         // Randomze for a storm!
00451                         if ( Random( 10 ) < 5 )
00452                         {
00453                               ubStormIntensity = 1;
00454                         }
00455             
00456    // ATE: Disable RAIN!
00457       //                AddSameDayRangedStrategicEvent( EVENT_RAINSTORM, uiStartTime, uiEndTime - uiStartTime, ubStormIntensity );
00458 
00459                         //AddSameDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_BEGINRAINSTORM, uiStartTime, ubStormIntensity );
00460                         //AddSameDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_ENDRAINSTORM,       uiEndTime, 0 );
00461                   }
00462                   */
00463             }     
00464       }
00465 
00466 }

00481 UINT32 guiMinLightningInterval = 5;
00482 UINT32 guiMaxLightningInterval = 15;
00483 
00484 UINT32 guiMinDLInterval = 1;
00485 UINT32 guiMaxDLInterval = 5;
00486 
00487 UINT32 guiProlongLightningIfSeenSomeone = 5;
00488 UINT32 guiChanceToDoLightningBetweenTurns = 20;
00489 
00490 
00491  // 60 = 1 second
00492 #define MIN_LIGHTNING_INTERVAL ( 60 * guiMinLightningInterval )
00493 #define MAX_LIGHTNING_INTERVAL ( 60 * guiMaxLightningInterval )
00494 
00495 #define MAX_DELAYED_SOUNDS 10
00496 #define NO_DL_SOUND 0xFFFFFFFF
00497  
00498 // 1000 = 1 second
00499 #define MIN_DL_INTERVAL ( 1000 * guiMinDLInterval )
00500 #define MAX_DL_INTERVAL ( 1000 * guiMaxDLInterval )
00501 
00502 #define EXTRA_ADD_VIS_DIST_IF_SEEN_SOMEONE ( 1000 * guiProlongLightningIfSeenSomeone  )
00503 #define CHANCE_TO_DO_LIGHTNING_BETWEEN_TURNS guiChanceToDoLightningBetweenTurns
00504 
00505 BOOLEAN gfLightningInProgress = FALSE;
00506 BOOLEAN gfHaveSeenSomeone = FALSE;
00507 
00508 UINT8 ubRealAmbientLightLevel = 0;
00509 BOOLEAN gfTurnBasedDoLightning = FALSE;
00510 BOOLEAN gfTurnBasedLightningEnd = FALSE;
00511 
00512 BOOLEAN gfWasTurnBasedWhenLightningBegin = FALSE;
00513 
00514 UINT8 gubLastTeamLightning;
00515 
00516 #define IS_TURNBASED ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED &&  gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )

00523 void EnvDoLightning(void)
00524 {
00525   static UINT32 uiCount=10, uiIndex=0, uiStrike=0, uiFrameNext=0;
00526   static UINT8 ubLevel=0, ubLastLevel=0;
00527   static UINT32 uiLastUpdate = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00528   static UINT32 uiTurnOffExtraVisDist = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00529   static UINT32 pDelayedSounds[ MAX_DELAYED_SOUNDS ];
00530   UINT32 uiDSIndex;
00531 
00532   if( GetJA2Clock() < uiLastUpdate )
00533   {
00534       uiLastUpdate = 0;
00535       memset( pDelayedSounds, NO_DL_SOUND, sizeof( UINT32 ) * MAX_DELAYED_SOUNDS );
00536   }
00537 
00538   if( GetJA2Clock() < uiLastUpdate + 1000 / 60 )return;
00539       else
00540             uiLastUpdate = GetJA2Clock();
00541 
00542   if( GetJA2Clock() > uiTurnOffExtraVisDist )
00543   {
00544       AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
00545       uiTurnOffExtraVisDist = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00546 
00547       if( gfTurnBasedLightningEnd )
00548       {
00549             BeginTeamTurn( gubLastTeamLightning );
00550             gfTurnBasedLightningEnd = FALSE;
00551       }
00552 
00553   }
00554 
00555   for( uiDSIndex = 0; uiDSIndex < MAX_DELAYED_SOUNDS; ++uiDSIndex )
00556         if( GetJA2Clock() > pDelayedSounds[ uiDSIndex ] )
00557         {
00558               PlayJA2Ambient(LIGHTNING_1+Random(2), HIGHVOLUME, 1);
00559               pDelayedSounds[ uiDSIndex ] = NO_DL_SOUND;
00560         }
00561 
00562   if ( gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause )
00563   {
00564     return;
00565   }
00566 
00567   if( IS_TURNBASED && !gfLightningInProgress )
00568   {
00569       if( !gfTurnBasedDoLightning )
00570       {
00571             return;
00572        }
00573       else
00574       {
00575             gfTurnBasedDoLightning = FALSE;
00576             uiFrameNext = 1;
00577             uiCount = 0;
00578             gfTurnBasedLightningEnd = TRUE;
00579       }
00580   }
00581 
00582       uiCount++;
00583       if(uiCount >= (uiFrameNext+10))
00584       {
00585             if( gfHaveSeenSomeone && gfWasTurnBasedWhenLightningBegin  )
00586                   uiTurnOffExtraVisDist = GetJA2Clock() + EXTRA_ADD_VIS_DIST_IF_SEEN_SOMEONE;
00587             else
00588                   uiTurnOffExtraVisDist = GetJA2Clock();
00589 
00590             gfLightningInProgress = FALSE;
00591             gfHaveSeenSomeone = FALSE;
00592             
00593             uiCount=0;
00594             uiIndex=0;
00595             ubLevel=0;
00596             ubLastLevel=0;
00597 
00598             uiStrike=Random(3);
00599             uiFrameNext=MIN_LIGHTNING_INTERVAL+Random(MAX_LIGHTNING_INTERVAL - MIN_LIGHTNING_INTERVAL);
00600       }
00601       else if(uiCount >= uiFrameNext)
00602       {
00603             if(uiCount == uiFrameNext)
00604             {
00605                   //EnvStopCrickets();
00606 //                PlayJA2Ambient(LIGHTNING_1+Random(2), HIGHVOLUME, 1);
00607                   for( uiDSIndex = 0; uiDSIndex < MAX_DELAYED_SOUNDS; ++uiDSIndex )
00608                         if( pDelayedSounds[ uiDSIndex ] == NO_DL_SOUND )
00609                         {
00610                               pDelayedSounds[ uiDSIndex ] = GetJA2Clock() + MIN_DL_INTERVAL+Random(MAX_DL_INTERVAL - MIN_DL_INTERVAL);
00611                               break;
00612                         }
00613 
00614                   ubRealAmbientLightLevel = ubAmbientLightLevel;
00615 
00616                   gfWasTurnBasedWhenLightningBegin = IS_TURNBASED;
00617 
00618                   gfLightningInProgress = TRUE;
00619                   AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
00620             }
00621 
00622             while(uiCount > ((UINT32)ubLightningTable[uiStrike][uiIndex][0] + uiFrameNext))
00623                   uiIndex++;
00624 
00625             ubLastLevel=ubLevel;
00626             ubLevel=min( ubRealAmbientLightLevel - 1, ubLightningTable[uiStrike][uiIndex][1] );
00627 
00628 /*    // ATE: Don't modify if scrolling!
00629         if ( gfScrollPending || gfScrollInertia )
00630         { 
00631         }
00632         else*/
00633         {
00634               if(ubLastLevel!=ubLevel)
00635               {
00636                     if(ubLevel > ubLastLevel)
00637                     {
00638                           LightAddBaseLevel(0, (UINT8)(ubLevel-ubLastLevel));
00639                           if(ubLevel > 0)
00640                                 RenderSetShadows(TRUE);
00641                     }
00642                     else
00643                     {
00644 //                        LightSubtractBaseLevel(0, (UINT8)(ubLastLevel-ubLevel));
00645                           LightSetBaseLevel( ubRealAmbientLightLevel - ubLevel );
00646                           if(ubLevel > 0)
00647                                 RenderSetShadows(TRUE);
00648                     }
00649                     SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00650               }
00651     }
00652 
00653       }
00654 }
00655 
00656 BOOLEAN LightningEndOfTurn( UINT8 ubTeam )
00657 {
00658       if( !(guiEnvWeather & WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS) )return TRUE;
00659       if( Random(100) >= CHANCE_TO_DO_LIGHTNING_BETWEEN_TURNS ) return TRUE;
00660 
00661       if( !gfTurnBasedLightningEnd )
00662       {
00663             gfTurnBasedDoLightning = TRUE;
00664             gubLastTeamLightning = ubTeam;
00665             EnvDoLightning();
00666             return FALSE;
00667        }
00668       else
00669       {
00670             return TRUE;
00671       }
00672 }
00673 
00674 UINT8 GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel()
00675 {
00676       if ( SectorTemperature( GetWorldMinutesInDay(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) == HOT )
00677       {
00678             return( HOT_DAY_LIGHTLEVEL );
00679       }
00680       else
00681       {
00682             return( gubEnvLightValue );
00683       }
00684 }

00686 
00687 void EnvBeginRainStorm( UINT8 ubIntensity )
00688 {
00689       if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00690       {
00691             gfDoLighting = TRUE;
00692 
00693   #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00694         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Starting Rain...."  );
00695   #endif
00696 
00697         if ( ubIntensity == 1 )
00698         {
00699               // Turn on rain storms
00700               guiEnvWeather   |= WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS;
00701               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Storm started." );
00702         }
00703         else
00704         {
00705               guiEnvWeather   |= WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS;
00706               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Rain started." );
00707         }
00708   }
00709 
00710 }
00711 
00712 void EnvEndRainStorm( )
00713 {
00714       gfDoLighting = TRUE;
00715 
00716 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00717       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Ending Rain...."  );
00718 #endif
00719 
00720         if ( guiEnvWeather & WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS )
00721         {
00722               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Storm ended." );
00723         }
00724         else
00725         {
00726               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Rain ended." );
00727         }
00728 
00729 
00730       guiEnvWeather     &= (~WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS );
00731       guiEnvWeather     &= (~WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS );
00732 }
00733

00856 
00857 void TurnOnNightLights()
00858 {
00859       INT32 i;
00860       for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00861       {
00862             if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE &&
00863                     LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_NIGHTTIME && 
00864                         !(LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & (LIGHT_SPR_ON|MERC_LIGHT) ) )
00865             {
00866                   LightSpritePower( i, TRUE );
00867             }
00868       }
00869 }
00870 
00871 void TurnOffNightLights()
00872 {
00873       INT32 i;
00874       for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00875       {
00876             if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE &&
00877                     LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_NIGHTTIME && 
00878                         LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ON && 
00879                         !(LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & MERC_LIGHT) ) 
00880             {
00881                   LightSpritePower( i, FALSE );
00882             }
00883       }
00884 }
00885 
00886 void TurnOnPrimeLights()
00887 {
00888       INT32 i;
00889       for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00890       {
00891             if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE &&
00892                     LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_PRIMETIME && 
00893                         !(LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & (LIGHT_SPR_ON|MERC_LIGHT) ) )
00894             {
00895                   LightSpritePower( i, TRUE );
00896             }
00897       }
00898 }
00899 
00900 void TurnOffPrimeLights()
00901 {
00902       INT32 i;
00903       for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00904       {
00905             if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE &&
00906                     LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_PRIMETIME && 
00907                         LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ON && 
00908                         !(LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & MERC_LIGHT) ) 
00909             {
00910                   LightSpritePower( i, FALSE );
00911             }
00912       }
00913 }
00914 
00915 void UpdateTemperature( UINT8 ubTemperatureCode )
00916 {
00917       switch( ubTemperatureCode )
00918       {
00919             case TEMPERATURE_DESERT_COOL:
00920                   gubDesertTemperature = 0;
00921                   break;
00922             case TEMPERATURE_DESERT_WARM: 
00923                   gubDesertTemperature = 1;
00924                   break;
00925             case TEMPERATURE_DESERT_HOT:
00926                   gubDesertTemperature = 2;
00927                   break;
00928             case TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_COOL:
00929                   gubGlobalTemperature = 0;
00930                   break;
00931             case TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_WARM:
00932                   gubGlobalTemperature = 1;
00933                   break;
00934             case TEMPERATURE_GLOBAL_HOT:
00935                   gubGlobalTemperature = 2;
00936                   break;
00937       }
00938       gfDoLighting = TRUE;    
00939 }
00940 
00941 INT8 SectorTemperature( UINT32 uiTime, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
00942 {
00943       if (bSectorZ > 0)
00944       {
00945             // cool underground
00946             return( 0 );
00947       }
00948       else if ( IsSectorDesert( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ) // is desert
00949       {
00950             return( gubDesertTemperature );     
00951       }
00952       else
00953       {
00954             return( gubGlobalTemperature );
00955       }
00956 }
